author: Thomas Macaulay
title: Researchers want your voice to train coronavirus-detecting AI
description: Researchers behind an AI app that detects coronavirus in your voice have asked for volunteers to help by uploading audio of them coughing, breathing, and talking. Scientists from Cambridge University will use the data to develop machine learning algorithms th…
